Frequently Asked Questions http://localhost:1313/aboutme/faq/ Tue, 01 Jan 2008 00:00:00 UTC http://localhost:1313/aboutme/faq/ >>>>>>> 93817c930aa722bdfcdaca47aec8eb97b4258d9c

Where is Chimera?

We’re located in downtown Sebastopol, California, an hour north of San Francisco. Learn more

What tools and equipment does Chimera have?

Head over to our tools and equipment page to learn about what we have to offer.

How do you pronounce Chimera?

======= Chimera's Space http://localhost:1313/aboutme/space/ Tue, 01 Jan 2008 00:00:00 UTC http://localhost:1313/aboutme/space/

{{% image /static/img/photos/portable-pano.jpg “Planning session at the mini-makerspace.” %}}

Current Space

Chimera is currently renting a small portable office building that is our space for regular meetups, classes, events, and as of December 2013, membership!

This space is great for anyone doing small arts and crafts, jewelry, software or hardware design or anyone working on a computer or who doesn’t require a lot of space to work.

Curious about what equipment and tools we have? Check out our list of equipment.

If this sounds interesting to you, learn more about membership.

Future Space

We’re in the process of an effort to rent a larger fabrication facility that will serve the needs of members that want to do metalwork and other large/messy forms of art.

If you’re interested in getting involved in our planning process, check out our Google Group and signup to our newsletter.

>>>>>>> 93817c930aa722bdfcdaca47aec8eb97b4258d9c About Chimera <<<<<<< HEAD http://localhost:1313/wwwtest/aboutme/ Tue, 01 Jan 2008 00:00:00 UTC http://localhost:1313/wwwtest/aboutme/ ======= http://localhost:1313/aboutme/ Tue, 01 Jan 2008 00:00:00 UTC http://localhost:1313/aboutme/ >>>>>>> 93817c930aa722bdfcdaca47aec8eb97b4258d9c

Chimera is a community arts and maker space in Sebastopol, California. We’re a diverse group of artists, makers, hackers and inventors who share a common desire to create, share and learn from each other.

Learn More

  • Read our FAQ.
  • Check out our current organization status.
  • See what tools and equipment we offer.
  • Read our mission and vision statements.
  • Learn about Chimera’s history.
  • See who is on our board and leadership committees.
  • Learn about our current space.
  • Teach at Chimera.
  • View our press page.
  • Download our logo and other assets.
  • Interested in donating? Checkout our Donate page and our Wishlist.
